project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Create room structure and navigation logic
Create inventory system for the player
Develop challenge scenarios (e.g., puzzles or simple battles)
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
